title: Gangplank skin
body: Must i own Gangplank to get the free skin. can i just use the free rotation version and still get the skin?

replies.body:
Correct, you must own Gangplank before the 10th, when the Burning Tides event ends.

You can play him while he's F2P, and as long as it's a matchmade game (no customs), and you'll have already earned Captain Gangplank.
